name: OR_CASE_BLOOD_PROD
description: The OR_CASE_BLOOD_PROD table contains OR management system case blood products.

columns.name: OR_CASE_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the case record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The number of the line of the blood product information for the case.

columns.name: BLOOD_PRODUCT_C_NAME
columns.description: The category value which indicates the type of blood product requested for the case.

columns.name: BLOOD_ESTIMATED
columns.description: The total number of units of the blood product requested for the case.

columns.name: BLOOD_MSR_UNIT_C_NAME
columns.description: Unit of measurement of the blood product requested for the case.
